author: Special Correspondent
title: Coronavirus | Man kills self in Himachal Pradesh after being blamed for spreading virus
description: The police said an investigation team has reached Bangarh village in Una and was probing the matter.
content:
A 34-year-old man, who tested negative for COVID-19, allegedly ended his life in a village of Himachal Pradeshs Una district on Sunday after a few villagers had allegedly blamed him for spreading the disease.
He had reportedly met two attendees of the Tablig… [+1104 chars]
